divs: Sighting Detailsthis is the second nights i have seen these strange lights in the sky. today, more, they seem to travel quite fast, 4 in a line, with the same distance between each one, then the 5th further back. they seem to disappear into nowhere. around 10 minutes after this sighting in a different direction, i saw firstly a row of three lights, one big white one, a smaller light in the centre, then another big white one at the end, which i would say were all from one flying object. minutes later, i saw another one of these red lights, very low, very clear, no sound, it looked like a giant candle flame burning red.
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Leicester
There were no other sightings in Leicester on or around November 8th 2009
Summary: 6 red lights in sky, one close looked like a giant candle flame
